name: Alpha Adhesives and Sealants Ltd A2024 Water-Based Retread Adhesive
description: Alpha Adhesives and Sealants Ltd A2024 Water-Based Retread Adhesive is a water based adhesive containing a rust inhibitor, suitable for bonding old rubber to new rubber, e.g. in the repair of conveyor belts, or manufacture of retread tires. This product gives enhanced tack for side walling. A2024 also features a built in indicator to determine the correct time to bond the rubber materials during retread.
